articles.title: Yellen 'probably done' when Biden ends term, may meet Chinese counterpart soon - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said on Saturday that she is "probably done" serving at the highest levels of government after President Joe Biden's term ends in January, but will likely meet again soon with her Chinese counterpart.
